org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.svd

Class BiasedMFItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.svd.BiasedMFItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class BiasedMFItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
    Item scorer using biased matrix factorization. This implements SVD-style item scorers.
    Since:
    2.1

    • Constructor Detail

      • BiasedMFItemScorer

        @Inject
public BiasedMFItemScorer(MFModel mod,
                                  BiasedMFKernel kern,
                                  @BaselineScorer
                                  ItemScorer bl)
        Create a new biased MF item scorer.
        Parameters:
        mod - The model (factorized matrix)
        kern - The kernel function to compute scores.
        bl - The baseline scorer (used to compute biases).

    • Method Detail

      • getUserPreferenceVector

        @Nullable
protected mikera.vectorz.AVector getUserPreferenceVector(long user)
        Get a user's preference vector.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        Returns:
        The user's preference vector, or null if no preferences are available for the user.

      • score

        public void score(long user,
                  @Nonnull
                  MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.
